#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int d,m,y,t;
	int re;
	string s;
	cin>>d>>s>>y;
	if(s=="January")
		m=1;
	else if(s=="Feburary")
		m=2;
	else if(s=="March")
		m=3;
	else if(s=="April")
		m=4;
	else if(s=="May")
		m=5;
	else if(s=="June")
		m=6;
	else if(s=="July")
		m=7;
	else if(s=="August")
		m=8;
	else if(s=="September")
		m=9;
	else if(s=="Octuber")
		m=10;
	else if(s=="November")
		m=11;
	else if(s=="December")
		m=12;
	re=d*m+y;
	while(re>9)
	{
		t=0;
		while(re)
		{
			t+=re%10;
			re/=10;
		}
		re=t;
	}
	cout<<re<<endl;
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
